Trees could form a symbiotic relationship with animals, providing shade and shelter in exchange for protection and care.
Trees could become mobile, traveling long distances to find better environments for growth and reproduction.
Trees could develop a new form of communication, using their roots to transmit messages to other trees.
Trees could become a new form of transportation, providing a sustainable and eco-friendly mode of travel.
Trees could become a new form of architecture, providing structural support and shading for buildings.
